name: Dakota the Puppy - Trading One Etirnity for Another
name_original: Dakota the Puppy - Trading One Etirnity for Another
description:
A remake AND remaster combo of Michael Hilliger's classic 2010 point 'n click adventure game, Dakota the Puppy: Season 3 - Episode 2.

Choose between a revitalization of the original game and a pixel art-style rendition as you play as Carl J. Robert, who seeks to turn Dakota back from being a zombie! You will need to play smart, figure out where to go, and don't get zombified yourself. 

...Maybe. You'll have to find out for sure. This isn't a long game at all.
